Vlad: Then why? Why did you bring me back here even though I had not 
been defeated? And what will you do of me?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Starstorm::
> 
> 
> "If I opened that cell, I'd ended in with you or death in a dificult 
> way... Not in your hands."replied Starstorm, who her face now hadn't 
> expresion "No thanks, I'm fallen of grace and a mistake like open 
> door's cell will mark my final fall"
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Vlad: So Starstorm, will you grant me honor and allow me to fight 
> you, 
> > or will you try another cheap trick that bastards like you do?
> >

> > react.
